name: AeroPlayer
short_description:
A music player software using all the new graphical features of Windows 7 and 8, jumplist, taskbar thumbnail, taskbar icon... Immersive and transparent, it contains a lot of desktop widgets you can use on your desktop to display the Album Art Cover.

Un lecteur de musique pleinement intégré à l'interface Windows 7.
